Name: King of Cooking
About the game: 'King of Cooking' is an exciting cooking simulator game! There are various kind of foods: skewers, cup rices, fruit juices, chicken nuggets, and even chitterlings! But always take in mind, YOU are the chief. You are the one who is responsible for handling ALL the customers’ orders for every food truck. Good Luck! [The harder you work, the more you earn] Don’t know how to cook? Worried about handling multiple food trucks simultaneously? That's OK. You’ll get used to it. Just for now, start with the easiest difficulty: intermediate. If you get confident with it, then try for the harder difficulty to earn more money! Money will compensate your hard work. [Different Food, Different Recipe] You can make 5 different foods. That means, you can enjoy 5 different game plays in here. You can enjoy following arrows, ordering ingredients, bake in a good timing, put right ingredient and shake it, and stop frying in a good timing. Please enjoy! [Three Different Endings] When the time is up, your sale is over. We will evaluate how was your day! It could be in the red or black. Could be just normal, too.
